title: Handle In-Flight Turbulence
description: A flight encounters unexpected severe turbulence. The flight and cabin crew must respond to ensure safety.

tasks.description: The flight crew turns on the 'Fasten Seatbelt' sign and makes an announcement to passengers and crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilots take immediate action to secure the cabin.

tasks.description: Cabin crew immediately suspends service, secures carts and galleys, and takes their seats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Cabin crew follows safety procedures to secure the cabin.

tasks.description: The flight crew requests a different altitude from ATC to escape the turbulence and files a PIREP (Pilot Report) to warn other aircraft.
tasks.expected_outcome: Pilots take action to improve ride comfort and safety and warn other flights.
